This game is great! It has all of the charm from the first Portal and more. There are always more levels to play as you can download other players levels from the Steam workshop. I definetly recommend
Spectacular stuff!

Очень стильное продолжение одной из самых лучших игр. Portal 2 действительно заслуживает всех своих наград. Всем кто не остался равнодушен к 1 части, кто любит головоломки и просто хорошие игры - рекомендую!!! Достойный кооп и поддержка сообществом прилагаются.

PS: The Cake is a Lie

It is a really imaginative game, the campaign storyline is good, the levels are really challenging. If you want to break your brain this is your best choice. The effects are really well done and its also funny sometimes. 9/10
If you got this game and wasn't satisfied, I would be utterly shocked. One of the best games I have ever played <3
good game

Pozycja obowiązkowa zarówno dla fanów częsci pierwszej, jak i tych którzy z tytułem nie mieli dotąd żadnej stycznośći (serio, macie wiele do nadrobienia). Dobry shooter, w ktorym nie zabijamy, a strzelamy z działka portalowego (tworząc dzięki temu przejścia do kolejnych pomieszczeń i poziomów).
Gra nieco dłuższa i bardziej wymagająca od części pierwszej.
The pinnacle of VALVe's game design philosophy to date.

It's awsome
10/10

Play awesome puzzles with remarkable stroy telling. Every character in Portal 2 have solid own feature that makes the game more brilliant. Nice co-op also. I highly recommend this to people who don't know about games well. This will change their think about games thoroughly.

Possibly the most epic single-player game I've ever played. Packed full of surprises, with great atmosphere and brilliant level design.
Portal war schon gut, aber Portal 2 ist noch besser!
Я не хотел его убивать, но меня заставили. В память о кубе компаньоне... 10 из 10
great game it is mind boggeling and great fun

I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake

Amazing game!Buy now! ^_^
Pure badassery at it's finest.   10/10   I have NOTHING bad to say about this game!

Diferente a todo lo que había jugado hasta el momento. Una jugabilidad tan adictiva y divertida que no pude abandonarlo hasta terminarlo en un tiempo record.
Una obra maestra que te hará pensar.

a game that makes you use your logical, visual and various space related abilities through a series of original and creative puzzles which are all followed by a humoristic and interesting storyline...

Quite possibly the most PERFECT video game ever conceived and developed to date. Lots of memorable moments, excellent voice-over acting, and a killer soundtrack to boot. A must buy for anyone into FPS games.
I'm making a note here: huge success.
:O Another triumph. Challenging, wonderful, hilarious, get it, play it, enjoy.
Single player için 6 saat, Co-op için 8 saat uğraştığım başka bir oyun olmadı açıkçası. Ne biçim pis bölüm tasarımı onlar.

Cave Johnson here. Since time immemorial video games have involved holes. Make a hole and climb into it. Hell, it worked for Minecraft. And Dig Dug now that I think about it. But I digress. Your job in this game is same as last time folks. Make holes and leap through to your death a few times until you figure out what the hell the crazy computer lady intended you to do. Oh yeah, she's back. Still alive you might say. I'd kill her myself only she beat me to it long before you were born. Ok, I've said too much. Here's a portal gun and some nifty boots. Have fun out there!

I love this game!  The puzzles are fun and challenging!  Co-op just doubles the fun and quadruples the portals and don't get me started on the science!  Overall the replay value is moderate and jokes never grow old in the moment!  This game is just one of my favourite puzzle games ever!
Excellent. Entertaining, puzzeling, and perplexingly creative. All with a good dose of humor.

This is a great game, it takes what the original had, and toss in multiplayer as a treat. That being said, the replay value is a bit stunted at the moement because if you remember how to do all the puzzles it's less fun well puzzling them out. Same with multiplayer, if you play through with one friend it's fun, play through with another after the first time? less fun because you'll just tell them how to do anything. It seems like valve is going to be doing Free DLC of new puzzles though so that will increase replay immensely.
For me to poop on

Most of the reason this keeps getting higher playtimes for me is through a lot of people I know wanting to do /SCIENCE/ with me occasionally since we haven't before or the fact I got it PS3 quite a while later.
Not that I mind, it's bloody brilliant. Dialogue is brilliant and the puzzles are fun to solve.
You must play PORTAL

A fantastic sequel to one of the best games ever made.  While not everything is perfect, it ticks all the boxes most of the time.  Funny, great puzzles, and some very interesting backstory to be discovered.  Well worth the time.
brilliant game!
Awesome puzzle game, great fun. Funny, exciting. Recommended that you play Portal first!

Co jest wyznacznikiem dobrej gry? Herbata. (Dlaczego?) Ponieważ, gdy gram robię sobie herbatę, czekam aż mi wystygnie no i sobie siorbię. I teraz, jeżeli gra jest kiepska no to jakieś pocieszenie mogę odnaleźć w mojej herbacie... 
Grając w Portal 2 dopiero drugiego dnia zauważyłem, że obok laptopa stoi jakiś kubek. Niech to będzie takim moim wyznacznikiem jak gra wciąga i pozwala, mknąć między kolejnymi portalami, zapominać o szaroburej codzienności. :)

IT'S A JUMPING GAME!

JUMP! JUMP!

игра-продолжение 1 части Portal, получилась весьма забавной.
1. Это "тро-ло" от компьютерного мозга Glados
2. Это насмешки у главгых героев (в совместном режиме co-op).
3. Появление цветных гелей и война с белым гелем (есть один такой уровень).
4. Прыжки-порталы на огромные расстояния (в одиночном режиме в финале).

Рекомендую игру, очень сильно развивает "ловкость и последовательность мышления".
A very Rich and well written sequal to Portal. Well worth your time and money most likely. I would suggest getting it and settling down for some fun.
Who the fuck cares
Best Game Evah

Uzasny kus, ktery se uz v prvnim vystupu zapsal do histroie!

Dvojka zcela nenasilne navazuje a ukazuje, ze i dokonale veci lze jeste zdokonalit.
Samotna podstata, vychazejici z vyuzivani portalu, svou genialitou nedava (na prvni pohled) sanci pro vyraznejsi vylepseni - nazor zmenite pri prvnich krocich hrou.
Jednoduse skvele!
10/10
Very good ^^

One hell of a great sequel, Portal 2 really steps up to the puzzles in this very long game. It's at least twice as long as the first Portal game. Co-op is also very fun and just as challenging as first player. If you want a great long game with a wonderful comidal sense, then please, play the first game, and if you liked it, then GET THIS GAME!

I enjoyed the first Portal a lot, and 2 is also a very good game. While it does have a better, more detailed story and neat new features, somehow, I feel like it lacks something that Portal 1 had, but I fail to describe what it was.

Why am I recommending this, and not Portal 1, then? Simple: Co-op. Doing science by yourself is fun, but it simply cannot compare to doing it with a friend, where you both experience your failures and successes. That, and in a way, two robots unable of speech make for likable characters. 
Wait, what if you're a nasty, smelly person with no friends? Do not fret, because this game allows you to find other people willing to play, who are as nasty and smelly as you.

Portal 2 is one of the most original and interesting game I've played in 2012! Incredible level design , funny history, legendary laboratories and humor and satiric pilgrimage between technology. A must! And try multiplayer! New levels, spectacular coop mode, intelligent gameplay and a rule that others game cannot have: you must really cooperate to reach the end of level. This means you will be full of friends at the end of a multiplayer month. Just buy it and finish it! Lord.
Probably one of the best games out there, a must have. During sales it's only €2,50
A great challenge! Took about sixteen hours of serious concentration to complete single player campaign.  Pick this one up!
欠陥タレット：ヘッヘヘヘ…

Pretty much have to agree with Yahtzee on this one.  If the original Portal was a shy, bookish but beautiful young girl who blossomed into an engaging young woman, Portal 2 is that girl after 20 years of tanning and smoking and hundreds of thousands of dollars worth of plastic surgery.

It's BIGGER and BETTER and TRIES TOO HARD and SUCKS as a result.  That's what I'm trying to say.  It sucks.  I didn't enjoy it at all.  I didn't enjoy playing "find the one section of portalable wall;" I didn't enjoy trying to find out which square inch of floor I was supposed to cover with rainbow slime; and I didn't particularly enjoy the game taking the originally brilliant narrative and trying to cram in as much additional zaniness as possible.

Brevity is the soul of wit, gentlemen.  The original was brilliant, short, and sweet, and the sequel is none of these things.  The massive environments do little to curb the sting of that realization.
Food for mind.
Excellent single-player mode backed up by hours of co-operative fun.
Sooo nice *_*
Totally worth playing! Funny, puzzling and Wheatley is awesome!
Great story, great game.
Once again, another game recommended to absolutely everyone, from three-year-olds to old farts, this is the game for you! Even more fun with co-operative mode. Puzzles... Puzzles everywhere!
Fun and challenging! One of the best games I've played!

La segunda entrega más esperada por todos los "portaleños" adictos a este juego.
La dinámica viene a ser la misma, pero...: Más horas de juego, más rompecabezas, nuevas formas de morir (?), muchísimos mejores gráficos, una increible historia... y como no... MULTIJUGADOR.
Exácto, este pequeño tiene 2 campañas, Forever Alone y Multijugador.
Recomendado 100% :D

Nota: Primero tendrías que jugar al Portal 1, o no te enterarás mucho de la historia.

“When life gives you lemons, don’t make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don’t want your damn lemons, what the hell am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life’s manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I’m the man who’s gonna burn your house down! With the lemons! I’m gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!”
It's like Portal, but more. So if you like Portal (which everyone does) you'll like this more.
Awesome =O
Valve's done it again! I personally liked this one better than the first one. BUT OH MY GOD IS WHEATLEY ANNOYING! I wanna strip him for parts and build a toaster.
one of the best co-op experiences. play it with a friend!

One of the greatest storytelling experiences of all time.

It's easy to get lost in the complexity of the world of Aperture Science but that is simultaneously what makes it so engaging to begin with! Portal 2 isn't a very difficult game but it offers a really great story, probably one of the best that Valve has ever told to be fair.

Even a decade later I still want to go back to this game and replay it from time to time and just re-experience that sensation I first felt when I played it as a teenager. 

If COOP is your thing then it also has a really great coop campaign to play through with a friend, mixing up the portal puzzles and making them much more difficult and complex to solve. It's amazing how much more variety an extra set of portals can bring to the table.

And for a fraction the the initial price? This game is a steal these days and I cannot recommend it enough.
play it
Uno dei migliori giochi a cui abbia mai giocato. Un capolavoro imperdibile!!

This being the sequel to the amazingly fun Portal it had allot to live up to, the Valve team realized this and decided to dedicate themselves to making the sequel live up to the communities expectations. It's safe to say it did not disappoint, continuing the great storyline with more interesting side stories and more and more secrets. Also adding multiplayer to the game, was one of the best things they ever did. This whole new side to the game gave this epic several extra hours of fun. Then the community began custom maps allowing more and more hours of fun and adventure seeing what the community can make. The achievements in this game are allot easier to gain but still supply a challenge. The puzzles are still the downfall of the game as some of the community still find puzzle games not to be there forte or they find them to difficult to complete. Still a great game!!!
If you haven't played portal 2 yet, you're still wrong.
I never thought a game would take over my life, until this game.

"Преступление — обыденность. Логика — редкость. Поэтому вам лучше сосредоточиться на логике, а не на преступлении"
"Crime — the ordinary. Logic — a rarity. Therefore it is better to you to concentrate on logic, instead of on a crime"
I had no idea science can be this fun!
Let's do science.  You monster.  Great game, voice acting really adds to an already immersive experience.  Recommended to anyone with a hankering for innovative puzzles and sarcastic insults.
Just started playing coop finally and it's awesome.  Some of the puzzles are tricky, but that "Eureka!" moment is great.
cool

Not much to say about this VGA 2011: Game of the Year nominee except that it is AWESOME! This game has very very funny characters and awesome gameplay. Adds the concept of teamwork with Portals.  Worth getting...especially if you loved the first one :)

The sequal to an absolutely awesome FPS that was origonally just added to the HL2 pack as a bit of a minor thing, but as since evolved greatly.

The main game is just as fun, if not more-so with the taunts by GlaDOS and the new AI that comes on scene but the two player isn't bad neither two people who have portal gun and the puzzels being far more difficult due to there being two portal guns to use in this.

A damn fun game and the single player adds a lot more with the new Gel that they put into the game too.

-gute Story 
-geiler Ko op Modus
-lohnt sich zu kaufen :)
You thought Portal was amazing?  With a much deeper Single Player and the addition of Multiplayer, you'll find this sequal worth every penny.
Hope to find time to play this, as it looks great.

ALL THE (alt+3)~!!! Story, gameplay, OST, Co-op, and pretty space...
funniest puzzler out there

I can honestly say that the gameplay and story is utterly amazing. Though puzzle games aren't my cup of tea, I enjoyed managing through the countless puzzles that the game throws at you. Not only does this game offers great gameplay and nice brain teasing puzzles, but the story line offers intriguing and memorable characters like Wheatly, and of course, Glados. It also offers nice surprises much like Glados' revival and plot twists like.... well, I won't spoil just what exactly happens :P

My overall opinion of the game is highly positive. I highly recommend it to any one. You don't necessarily have to be a fan of the first Portal game to enjoy it for what it is. If you enjoy a great story line, puzzles, or even better, both, then you will be able to enjoy this game for it's entirety.
Really a creative game, play it.

A mix of compelling story and intricate puzzles, this interesting dynamic will take you on another trip through the ruins of what was left behind from the last game. You play as Chell, the mute protagonist with a will of iron who must defeat GLaDOS the artificial AI playing with her by having her solve these tests of the mind.
Buy it. For science. You monster.

Seguito del premiatissimo "Portal" ...! 
Come non si può raccomandare un titolo che sottolinea in maniera così marcata il concetto che i VG fatti con il cuore e con la mente sono veramente "Opere d'Arte!"

Nostalgia, novedad, espectacularidad. Esas 3 palabras definen esta INCREIBLE entrega. Portal 2, de nuevo de cabeza a Aperture science, pero esta vez todo, TODO a cambiado y lo único que reconcomerás sera una voz, una voz que te costo mucho hacer callar, una voz robotica...si...ha vuelto, con sed de venganza y con muuuchas nuevas pruebas para romperte las pelo--as. nuevas tecnologías y una historia que te descubrirá los principios y el final portal.
